item.title: THE OTHER CLUB... On Our Political Enemies: Theyâ€™re Easy to Hate, But Should We??? [The Other Club]
item.description:
The Other Club with Mike and Tim ~ December 02, 2023
WE"RE BACK! On this episode of The Other Club, hosts Dr. Michael Thiessen and Tim Tysoe discuss politics, the culture wars and the need for Christians to examine their heart amidst this great struggle. Our enemies are easy to hate, but should we? TUNE IN TO FIND OUT!

UPCOMING EVENTS
